programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the third day of the Grand Slam tournament at Roland Garros, where the first-round matches are set to conclude. Andy Murray had to come back from two sets down to eventually defeat Radek Stepanek at this stage last year, before eventual champion Novak Djokovic enjoyed a considerably more comfortable straight-sets victory over Lu Yen-hsun. In the women's event, there was a shock 6-2, 3-6, 6-3 defeat for third seed Angelique Kerber against Kiki Bertens.(n)
